args.text:
To run GPT models through the website https://docs.agpt.co/setup/#configuration, follow these steps:

1. Create an OpenAI account and obtain an API key.
2. Install the OpenAI Python package using pip.
3. Import the OpenAI model in your Python code.
4. Set a prompt for the model to generate a response.
5. Generate a response using the model.
6. Print the response.

For more detailed instructions, please refer to the website https://docs.agpt.co/setup/#configuration.
